definitions.example: Before the birth of the man's child, he said: "I want a son, not a daughter."

definitions.definition: A male adopted person in relation to his adoptive parents.
A male person who has such a close relationship with an older or otherwise more authoritative person that he can be regarded as a son of the other person.
A male person considered to have been significantly shaped by some external influence.
definitions.example: He was a son of the mafia system.
The pharaohs were believed to be sons of the Sun.

definitions.definition: A familiar address to a male person from an older or otherwise more authoritative person.
An informal address to a friend or person of equal authority.
